eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Pennsylvania; at 07:43 AM ON JAN 15, 2026 Effective until 09:43 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Test This is a State Wide Required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System originating from the Pennsylvania Emergency Management Agency, Harrisburg. This is only a test
